thought: To craft a white_stained_glass, I first need to craft a white_dye. This can be done by placing a lily_of_the_valley in the crafting grid. I also need to craft 8 glass. This can be done by placing 8 red_sand in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first smelt one of the red_sands into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 10 to slot 11 with quantity 1
